headline.main: Surging Bruins Edge Devils 3-2 on Spooner's Goal
headline.print_headline: Surging Bruins Edge Devils 3-2 on Spooner's Goal

lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins had a goal pulled off the board and allowed a tying one seconds after a weird stoppage.
snippet: The Boston Bruins had a goal pulled off the board and allowed a tying one seconds after a weird stoppage....
